speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Alexander Stubb, replaced by Ingo Friedrich, on behalf of the Committee on Constitutional Affairs, on the framework for the activities of lobbyists in the EU institutions ( 2007/2115(INI) ) ( A6-0105/2008 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Alexander Stubb, replaced by Ingo Friedrich, on behalf of the Committee on Constitutional Affairs, on the framework for the activities of lobbyists in the EU institutions ( 2007/2115(INI) ) ( A6-0105/2008 ).
agenda_item: Framework for the activities of lobbyists in the EU institutions (debate)
